title.connected: ENSv2: The Next Generation of ENS

caption.unconnected: Approve your ENS names now and enjoy the benefits as soon as ENSv2 launches.
caption.connected: Approve your ENS names now and enjoy the benefits as soon as ENSv2 launches.

accessible.title: Making ENS accessible to more people
accessible.caption: We're taking our knowledge from the last 7 years at the frontier of web3 naming to re-envision the architecture from the ground up on L2 By utilizing L2s, we're excited to make ENS more accessible to a wider range of users.
